item.title: The Crypto Show with Paul Puey of Airbitz and Travis County Republican Chair Robert Morrow on his Presidential bid
item.description:
The Crypto Show with Paul Puey of Airbitz and Travis County Republican Chair Robert Morrow on his Presidential bid

The first hour is spent talking with Paul Puey of Airbitz on the new API plug in to integrate Airbitz into other apps. We also touch on Edge Security and the Arcade City, Airbitz partnership. The second hour is spent talking with Travis County Republican Chair Robert Morrow who is also Presidential hopeful as an Independent write in.

item.title: KeepKey and Shapeshift team up for dynamic and secure cryptocurrency trading
item.description:
KeepKey and Shapeshift team up for dynamic and secure cryptocurrency trading

KeepKey and ShapeShift recently announced a partnership to create the first fully trustless, highly secure, process for trading cryptocurrencies. According to KeepKey, beta testing will begin next week. - ShapeShift Formed in mid-2014, ShapeShift was founded by early bitcoin entrepreneur Erik Voorhees.

item.title: Coinbase and GDAX Control 3.5% Of The Entire Ethereum Supply
item.description:
Coinbase and GDAX Control 3.5% Of The Entire Ethereum Supply

There is a lot of talk going on about Ethereum switching to proof-of-take at some point in the future. While this will significantly reduce the inflation in the ecosystem, it will also pose a new set of challenges. To put this into perspective, Coinbase and GDAX now control 3.5% of the entire Ethereum supply.

item.title: BTC Relay wants Bitcoin and Ethereum to hang out together
item.description:
BTC Relay wants Bitcoin and Ethereum to hang out together

Ever since Ethereum went live about a year ago there have been critics who questioned the need to launch another Blockchain with its own cryptographic token to secure the network. But it doesn't mean that both blockchains can't succeed or interoperate, states Joseph Chow, creator of BTC Relay.

item.title: Banks Are Hesitant To Embrace Blockchain Due To Transaction Confidentiality
item.description:
Banks Are Hesitant To Embrace Blockchain Due To Transaction Confidentiality

Albeit blockchain allows for transactions to become public knowledge, the technology can also be used to keep accurate information confidential. Various banks around the world see transaction confidentiality as a primary security concern for embracing blockchain right now. This new report by Greenwich Associates only confirms the financial sector will not adopt this technology anytime soon.

item.title: Bears and Bulls Continue to Battle Over Bitcoin Price
item.description:
Bears and Bulls Continue to Battle Over Bitcoin Price

The price of bitcoin has fallen since our last piece, this time hovering around $573 at press time. Some feel this was to be expected: things haven't taken much of a turn since the Bitfinex hack, and news regarding Russia's latest stance on bitcoin has been slow to hit home.

item.title: Blockchain to Attract the World to Hong Kong
item.description:
Blockchain to Attract the World to Hong Kong

One of the four cities that will be the "hotbeds" of the blockchain financial services is Hong Kong as the technology is expected to be implemented by banks and other financial institutions within three years. That's according to the director business development and strategy, Cloud + Enterprise at the U.S.

item.title: Hidden Tear Ransomware Targets Arabic Pokémon GO Players
item.description:
Hidden Tear Ransomware Targets Arabic Pokémon GO Players

It is not unlikely we will see more ransomware versions targeting Pokémon players moving forward. Since the launch of Pokémon GO, people around the world have been captivated by this mobile game. Not too long ago, the client was also released for Windows users, which only helps grow the Pokémon ecosystem.

item.title: Bitfinex Updates Its Users on the Progress of the Investigation - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Bitfinex Updates Its Users on the Progress of the Investigation - NEWSBTC

Bitfinex has recently published an update about the ongoing investigation into the recent hacking incident. Read more... Bitfinex, the Hong Kong-based cryptocurrency platform is finally ready to share more information about the recent security breach. The digital currency platform has made preliminary findings of the investigation public in its recent update.

item.title: Bitcoin Price Watch; Trading Intrarange Today - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Watch; Trading Intrarange Today - NEWSBTC

Here's a look at what we are focusing on in the bitcoin price this morning. So today we're going to do something a little different, and focus on intrarange action as a primary strategy in our bitcoin price trading.
